To assess progression free survival define time date first nivolumab infusion date death evidence progression disease assess compute tomography ( CT ) image every 8 week accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) criteria 1.1 . II . To assess overall survival define time date first nivolumab infusion death patient metastatic locally advanced ACC . III . To assess safety tolerability profile nivolumab describe number , frequency , severity adverse event accord National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) version 4.0.3 assess every 2 week patient therapy . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 2 year .
